title: Have they finally won me over? - Logitech MX Master Mechanical Keyboard + MX3S Mouse
description: Check out the OnePlus 10 Pro 5G with 12GB RAM & 256GB of storage at   Logitech makes some great products, but not everyone likes their keyboards. Is their new MX Master Mechanical good enough for Plouffe?  Buy Logitech MX Mechanical Mini Wireless Keyboard:  Buy Logitech MX Master 3s Wireless Mouse:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:31 MX Master 3S overview and unboxing 2:31 First impressions and comparison 3:07 MX Mechanical Mini unboxing 5:00 Key switch impressions 6:27 MX Mechanical Unboxing 7:38 Key switch and key cap impressions 9:35 Sponsor - OnePlus 10 Pro 5G 10:19 Setting up the mouse and keyboard 13:03 Trying them out! 15:29 Conclusion
